body_html:
@peterjc123
I did a search for .lib in pytorch and found the following libs:
a.lib
_THCUNN.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_nvrtc.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_THNN.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_C.cp36-win_amd64.lib
shm.lib
protobuf-nanopb.lib
xtdata.lib
ATen.lib

Not seeing TH.lib/THC.lib anywhere
I tried linking with all these libs, linking with Aten.lib makes all linker errors but one go away. The one that is left is:
Creating library .\Release_nms.lib and object .\Release_nms.exp
LINK : warning LNK4098: defaultlib 'LIBCMT' conflicts with use of other libs; use /NODEFAULTLIB:library
nms_cuda.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol state
._nms.so : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals

The symbol state is an extern defined as follows:
extern THCState *state;

Any ideas?

body:
@peterjc123 
I did a search for .lib in pytorch and found the following libs:
a.lib
_THCUNN.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_nvrtc.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_THNN.cp36-win_amd64.lib
_C.cp36-win_amd64.lib
shm.lib
protobuf-nanopb.lib
xtdata.lib
ATen.lib

Not seeing TH.lib/THC.lib anywhere
I tried linking with all these libs, linking with Aten.lib makes all linker errors but one go away. The one that is left is: 
   Creating library .\Release\_nms.lib and object .\Release\_nms.exp
LINK : warning LNK4098: defaultlib 'LIBCMT' conflicts with use of other libs; use /NODEFAULTLIB:library
nms_cuda.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol state
.\_nms.so : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals

The symbol state is an extern defined as follows: 
extern THCState *state;

Any ideas?
